content: knitted jumper in drops karisma the piece is worked top down with round yoke and nordic pattern on the yoke sizes s - xxxl pattern no u-900 yarn group b- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-500-550-600-650 g colour 82 maroon 100-100-100-100-100-100 g colour 77 light oak **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch and nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm **needles ** drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib
